============================================
core/misc/triple_quoted_string
============================================

initial begin
  string a = """
  a, b, c, "xy"
  """;
end

----

(source_file
  (initial_construct
    (statement_or_null
      (statement
        (statement_item
          (seq_block
            (block_item_declaration
              (data_declaration
                (data_type_or_implicit
                  (data_type))
                (list_of_variable_decl_assignments
                  (variable_decl_assignment
                    name: (simple_identifier)
                    (expression
                      (primary
                        (primary_literal
                          (string_literal
                            (triple_quoted_string)))))))))))))))
